articles.title: Stocks slide, treasury yields jump as inflation fears crescendo - Reuters
articles.description: Asian and European shares fell, U.S. and European bond yields hit multi-year highs, and oil prices climbed on Wednesday as investors braced for tighter monetary policy to combat troubling levels of inflation.
articles.content: LONDON/TOKYO, Jan 19 (Reuters) - Asian and European shares fell, U.S. and European bond yields hit multi-year highs, and oil prices climbed on Wednesday as investors braced for tighter monetary polic… [+3436 chars]

articles.author: Muireann Duffy
articles.title: Ireland records sixth highest number of GDPR breach notifications in Europe - BreakingNews.ie
articles.description: On a per capita basis, Ireland had the fourth-highest rate of breach notifications across Europe.
articles.content:
European data regulators issued a total of 1.1 billion in GDPR fines in 2021, with Ireland noting the sixth-highest rate of GDPR breach notifications of 31 European countries.
